manifest.author: nightx24
manifest.changelog:
• Redesigned Notification Settings

• Redesigned Notification Swipe Action Icons

• Updated Stories Section
↳ Larger profile icons
↳ Rounded corners

• New Font Enabled for post text

• Added Total Duration to video scrubber

• Enabled Like Animation for Music Notes

• Posts shared to Profile only won’t appear in others' Feed

• Saved Posts section enabled in Profile view

• Improved overall config stability for smoother experience

• Minor UI refinements and background optimizations
manifest.name: Night-X's Backup
